name: NMI Holdings, Inc.
description: NMI Holdings, Inc. is a leading provider of private mortgage insurance (PMI) in the United States. Founded in 2011 and headquartered in Walnut Creek, California, NMI aims to support a sustainable housing market by offering innovative mortgage insurance solutions that help lenders mitigate risk associated with high loan-to-value (LTV) loans. The company's proprietary technology platform allows for efficient underwriting and risk assessment, enabling lenders to make informed lending decisions. NMI's comprehensive suite of products includes traditional mortgage insurance, as well as alternative products designed to meet the diverse needs of the mortgage marketplace. NMI is dedicated to promoting homeownership and providing solutions that facilitate the growth of the housing industry while also adhering to stringent regulatory requirements. With a focus on customer service and operational excellence, NMI is well-positioned to capitalize on market opportunities and enhance its competitive advantage in the evolving mortgage insurance landscape.

seo.meta_title: NMI Holdings, Inc. | Private Mortgage Insurance Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore NMI Holdings, Inc., a leading provider of private mortgage insurance in the U.S. Discover our innovative solutions for lenders and commitment to supporting homeownership.

faq.question: What does NMI Holdings do?
faq.answer: NMI Holdings provides private mortgage insurance to lenders to help mitigate risk associated with high LTV loans.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of NMI Holdings?
faq.answer: Bradley Shuster is the CEO of NMI Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is NMI Holdings headquartered?
faq.answer: NMI Holdings is headquartered in Walnut Creek, California, USA.

faq.question: What products does NMI Holdings offer?
faq.answer: NMI Holdings offers private mortgage insurance and lender paid mortgage insurance.
